Introduction
============

Task3
-----

See module :py:mod:`task3`

This purpose of this project is to answer task3 of the homework assignment
for Applied Machine Learning

The summary function in this module calculates the mean and standard deviation
of a numpy dataset along a specified axis.

Standard Deviation

.. math::

	\sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \overline{x})^2}

Mean

.. math::

	\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i)

See module :py:mod:`task3`


Task4
-----
See module :py:mod:`pair_plot`

Creates a pair-plot of the iris dataset
